name: Nullmaze
description:
Welcome to "Nullmaze" - an infinite world where you can buy items for collected coins to fill the world as you want and build your own adventure. Try different combinations of items, find the most powerful equipment and become the reachest hero in history.

Sandbox with your decisions
You determine your game world by buying items that you want to be in your world

Complex combinations of items
In the pursuit of quick profit you can fight with stronger enemies, but defeating them with bare hands is not easy - use complex chains of items and crafting to get strong weapons and armor.

The game world is infinite and made of bought items
Getting coins you get new opportunities for the game world, from an empty piece of land it revolves into a world full of opportunities and dangers.

Find answers to the mysteries of this world and fight the legendary villain!
